about.block1: Träwelling is a free check-in service that lets you tell your friends where you are and where you can log your public transit journeys. In short, you can check into trains and get points for it.
about.calculation:
The distance is rounded to the nearest 10km and then divided by 10. Afterwards the base points are added.
An ICE journey of 143km thus earns you 10 + round up(143/10) = 10 + 15 = 25 Points, for an S-Bahn journey of 8km you get 2 + round up(8/10) = 2 + 1 = 3 Points.
We want you to check in as soon as possible so that the platform always has an up-to-date status of your journeys. reasonTherefore, you will only receive full points if you check in during your journey or 20min before live departure (scheduled departure + delay). If you check in 1h before or after the travel period, you can still get 1/4 of the points. If you check in earlier or later on a connection, you will receive the full kilometres and hours, but only one pity point.
about.feature-missing: In this version of Träwelling we'll start from scratch – and may have missed little-used functions. If you would like to suggest a feature, just send an email to
about.feature-missing-heading: Something's missing! Why was this feature removed?
about.heading: About us
about.name: The name is an allusion to the well-known "Senk ju for träwelling wis Deutsche Bahn", which you should have heard in almost every long-distance train of the Deutsche Bahn.
about.name-heading: Where does the name come from?
about.no-train: We use an interface of the Deutsche Bahn, where not all offers are displayed directly. Unfortunately, we can't do much with it if your train is not there.
about.points1: The points consist of the product class and the distance of your journey.
about.who: Since 2013, Träwelling has been developed by ever different people. Partly only bugfixes, partly bigger changes. You can find more information in the

notifications.socialNotShared.twitter.42: It looks like we've been rate-limited by Twitter. (429 Too Many Requests)
notifications.socialNotShared.twitter.50: It looks like Twitter was down when we tried to tweet your check-in. (504 Bad Gateway)

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.not-signed-yet: You have not signed our privacy policy yet. To use Träwelling, you'll need to agree to our privacy policy. If you don't agree, you can delete your account with the button below.
privacy.we-changed: We changed our privacy policy. To continue using our service, you have to agree to the latest changes. If you don't agree, you can delete your account with the button below.

settings.delete-account-verify:
Upon confirmation, all data associated with the account will be irrevocably deleted from :appname.
Tweets and toots sent by :appname will not be deleted.

settings.privacy.update.success: Your privacy settings have been updated.
settings.search-engines.description: We set a noindex tag on your profile to tell the search engines that your profile should not be indexed. We have no influence on whether the search engine takes this wish into account.
